review: If I could go lower I would. I mainly bought this for movies I downloaded on my iPad to watch in hotels or when I'm home. Everything works fine except AirPlay, that's the main issue. I get about 4-5 minutes of watching a movie or video, then the screen freezes and the volume continues. This happens for about 10 minutes at a time every 5 minutes or so, makes it very very annoying. Contacted Apple and got the usual about make sure you have the newest updates, your signal strength is strong, and there's nothing interfering with the air sync. Did all that plus restarted the machine and it still does it. Bottom line is if you are looking for something that has Netflix, Amazon, and other video watching service then there are several that are cheaper than an AppleTv that work just as good. About to box mine up and take it right back.
